title.@value: Web Analytics Learning Records Universal Connector (WALRUC)

description.@value: Web Analytics Learning Records Universal Connector allows for the integration of web analytics data with a Learning Record Store (LRS) using the xAPI (Experience API) standard. It enables the conversion of web analytics data, such as the data collected by Matomo, into an xAPI format that can be stored in a LRS.

functionalities.@value: WALRUC converts web browsing analytics into xAPI statement
